step.sql: INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LINK_NAMEGID (PID) (SELECT P.NAME_GROUPID FROM RD_LINK_NAME P, TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID = T.PID UNION SELECT P.NAME_GROUPID FROM RD_LINK_ADDRESS P, TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID = T.PID );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LINK_NAMEID (PID) (SELECT P.NAME_ID FROM RD_NAME P, TEMP_RD_LINK_NAMEGID T WHERE P.NAME_GROUPID = T.PID);
SELECT P.* FROM RD_LINK P WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID=T.PID);
SELECT P.* FROM RD_LINK_FORM P,TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_LINK_LIMIT P,TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_LINK_LIMIT_TRUCK P,TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_LINK_RTIC P,TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_LINK_INT_RTIC P,TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_LINK_SIDEWALK P,TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_LINK_WALKSTAIR P,TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_LINK_ZONE P,TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_LINK_NAME P,TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_LINK_ADDRESS P,TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_NAME P,TEMP_RD_LINK_NAMEID T WHERE P.NAME_ID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_SPEEDLIMIT P,TEMP_RD_SPEEDLIMIT T WHERE P.PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_WARNINGINFO P,TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_TRAFFICSIGNAL P,TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_HGWG_LIMIT P,TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_ELECTRONICEYE P,TEMP_RD_ELECTRONICEYE T WHERE P.PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_ELECEYE_PAIR P,TEMP_ELECEYE_GROUP T WHERE P.GROUP_ID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_ELECEYE_PART P,TEMP_ELECEYE_GROUP T WHERE P.GROUP_ID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_SIGNPOST P,TEMP_RD_SIGNPOST T WHERE P.PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_SIGNPOST_PHOTO P,TEMP_RD_SIGNPOST T WHERE P.SIGNPOST_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_SIGNPOST_LINK P,TEMP_RD_SIGNPOST T WHERE P.SIGNPOST_PID=T.PID;
SELECT /*+ USE_HASH(P,T) */ P.* FROM RD_LANE P WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TEMP_RD_LANE T WHERE P.LANE_PID=T.PID ) ;
SELECT /*+ USE_HASH(P,T) */ P.* FROM RD_LANE_TOPO_DETAIL P WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TEMP_RD_LANE_TOPO_DETAIL T WHERE P.TOPO_ID=T.PID ) ;
SELECT /*+ USE_HASH(P,T) */ P.* FROM RD_LANE_TOPO_VIA P WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TEMP_RD_LANE_TOPO_DETAIL T WHERE P.TOPO_ID=T.PID );
SELECT /*+ USE_HASH(P,T) */ P.* FROM RD_LANE_CONDITION P WHERE EXISTS ( SELECT 1 FROM TEMP_RD_LANE T WHERE P.LANE_PID=T.PID );
SELECT P.* FROM RD_LINK_SPEEDLIMIT P,TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_TMCLOCATION_LINK P,TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_TMCLOCATION P,TEMP_RD_LINK_TMC T WHERE P.GROUP_ID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_LINK_PARAM_ADAS P,TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM RD_SPEEDBUMP P,TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM ADAS_ITPLINK_GEOMETRY P,TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID=T.PID;
SELECT P.* FROM ADAS_RDLINK_GEOMETRY_DTM P,TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID=T.PID;
DELETE FROM RD_LINK P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T );
DELETE FROM RD_LINK_FORM P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T );
DELETE FROM RD_LINK_LIMIT P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T );
DELETE FROM RD_LINK_LIMIT_TRUCK P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T );
DELETE FROM RD_LINK_RTIC P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T );
DELETE FROM RD_LINK_INT_RTIC P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T );
DELETE FROM RD_LINK_SIDEWALK P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T );
DELETE FROM RD_LINK_WALKSTAIR P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T );
DELETE FROM RD_LINK_ZONE P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T );
DELETE FROM RD_LINK_NAME P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T );
DELETE FROM RD_LINK_ADDRESS P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T );
DELETE FROM RD_SPEEDLIMIT P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_SPEEDLIMIT T );
DELETE FROM RD_WARNINGINFO P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T );
DELETE FROM RD_TRAFFICSIGNAL P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T );
DELETE FROM RD_ELECTRONICEYE P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_ELECTRONICEYE T );
DELETE FROM RD_SIGNPOST P WHERE P.PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_SIGNPOST T );
DELETE FROM RD_SIGNPOST_PHOTO P WHERE P.SIGNPOST_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_SIGNPOST T );
DELETE FROM RD_SIGNPOST_LINK P WHERE P.SIGNPOST_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_SIGNPOST T );
DELETE FROM RD_LANE P WHERE P.LANE_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_LANE T );
DELETE FROM RD_LANE_TOPO_DETAIL P WHERE P.TOPO_ID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_LANE_TOPO_DETAIL T );
DELETE FROM RD_LANE_TOPO_VIA P WHERE P.TOPO_ID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_LANE_TOPO_DETAIL T );
DELETE FROM RD_LANE_CONDITION P WHERE P.LANE_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_LANE T );
DELETE FROM RD_LINK_SPEEDLIMIT P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T );
DELETE FROM RD_TMCLOCATION_LINK P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T );
DELETE FROM RD_TMCLOCATION P WHERE P.GROUP_ID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_RD_LINK_TMC T );
DELETE FROM RD_LINK_PARAM_ADAS P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN(SELECT PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T );
DELETE FROM RD_SPEEDBUMP P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T);
DELETE FROM RD_HGWG_LIMIT P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T);
DELETE FROM ADAS_ITPLINK_GEOMETRY P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T );
DELETE FROM ADAS_RDLINK_GEOMETRY_DTM P WHERE P.LINK_PID IN (SELECT T.PID FROM TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T );
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK SELECT LINK_PID FROM RD_LINK A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM RD_LINK B WHERE A.LINK_PID = B.LINK_PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_SIGNPOST SELECT PID FROM RD_SIGNPOST A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM RD_SIGNPOST B WHERE A.PID = B.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LANE SELECT LANE_PID FROM RD_LANE A WHERE A.ROWID != (SELECT MAX(B.ROWID) FROM RD_LANE B WHERE A.LANE_PID = B.LANE_PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LINK_NAMEGID (PID) (SELECT DISTINCT P.NAME_GROUPID FROM RD_LINK_NAME P, TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID = T.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LANE_TOPO_DETAIL (PID) (SELECT DISTINCT TD.TOPO_ID FROM RD_LANE_TOPO_DETAIL TD, TEMP_RD_LANE T WHERE (TD.IN_LANE_PID = T.PID OR TD.OUT_LANE_PID = T.PID));
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LINK_TMC (PID) (SELECT DISTINCT P.GROUP_ID FROM RD_TMCLOCATION_LINK P, TEMP_FILTER_RD_LINK T WHERE P.LINK_PID = T.PID);
INSERT /*+ append */ INTO TEMP_RD_LINK_NAMEID (PID) (SELECT P.NAME_ID FROM RD_NAME P, TEMP_RD_LINK_NAMEGID T WHERE P.NAME_GROUPID = T.PID);
